Summary: Object hovered, moved toward us, then went back and up, into the clouds
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Terre Haute
There were no other sightings in Terre Haute on or around March 13th 2010
divs: sighting detailson saturday, march 13, at approximately 1:30 p.m., my brother and i observed a rather large silver colored round object hovering just below the clouds at the ft. harrison and lafayette avenue intersection area in terre haute, indiana, which in the north\northwest part of terre haute. it had what appeared to be a large, black antenna like object on top of it. i saw what i thought was a red streak against black on the side of the object. this object hovered below the clouds, moved forward a bit, in the direction toward where my brother and i sat in my car watching it, then it started to move back and up, becoming smaller as it disappeared behind the thick, dark clouds.
